overview: Surfaces speaks about continuity, it is a single rhythmic plane which is sustained by music. The best commentary on it is related to a phrase from Georges Petrix: What is the meaning of form, color, material? Why is it there? If it's only to make someone say "yes, isn't that pretty, isn't that nice?" then we're not interested. In truth, what it is an expression ourselves, our lives.
title: Surfaces
